languages.text: "А вы полагаете, что слуги Инквизиции имеют обыкновение нарекать еретиками невинных? Какое прискорбное недоверие, я его запомню".
"Do you think the servants of the Inquisition are in the habit of calling the innocent heretics? Such lamentable distrust — I will remember it."
languages.original_text: "А вы полагаете, что слуги Инквизиции имеют обыкновение нарекать еретиками невинных? Какое прискорбное недоверие, я его запомню".

traits.locale_text: "Do you think that the servants of the Inquisition are in the habit of calling the innocent heretics? What a regrettable distrust, I will remember it."
"Do you think the servants of the Inquisition are in the habit of calling the innocent heretics? Such lamentable distrust — I will remember it."
"Do you think the servants of the Inquisition are in the habit of calling the innocent heretics? Such lamentable distrust — I will remember it."
"Do you think the servants of the Inquisition are in the habit of calling the innocent heretics? Such lamentable distrust — I will remember it."

languages.text: “莫非你以为，审判庭的仆从总是习惯把无辜人员称为异端分子吗？如此怀疑，实在是令人感到可悲。我会记住这件事情的。”
languages.original_text: "Do you think the servants of the Inquisition are in the habit of calling the innocent heretics? Such lamentable distrust — I will remember it."

traits.locale_text: “莫非你以为，审判庭的仆从总是习惯把无辜人员称为异端分子吗？如此怀疑，实在是令人感到可悲。我会记住这件事情的。”

languages.text: «¿Cree que los sirvientes de la Inquisición tienen por costumbre considerar herejes a los inocentes? Esa desconfianza es lamentable... y no la olvidaré».
languages.original_text: "Do you think the servants of the Inquisition are in the habit of calling the innocent heretics? Such lamentable distrust — I will remember it."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cree que los sirvientes de la Inquisición tienen por costumbre considerar herejes a los inocentes? Esa desconfianza es lamentable... y no la olvidaré».

languages.text: 「異端審問庁の公僕は、無実の異端者を呼び出す習慣があると？実に嘆かわしい疑念を抱いている。その発言、覚えておこう」
languages.original_text: "Do you think the servants of the Inquisition are in the habit of calling the innocent heretics? Such lamentable distrust — I will remember it."

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問庁の公僕は、無実の異端者を呼び出す習慣があると？実に嘆かわしい疑念を抱いている。その発言、覚えておこう」

languages.text: « Vous pensez que les serviteurs de l'Inquisition s'amusent à traiter des innocents d'hérétiques ? Votre méfiance est lamentable... Je saurai m'en souvenir. »
languages.original_text: "Do you think the servants of the Inquisition are in the habit of calling the innocent heretics? Such lamentable distrust — I will remember it."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pensez que les serviteurs de l'Inquisition s'amusent à traiter des innocents d'hérétiques ? Votre méfiance est lamentable... Je saurai m'en souvenir. »

languages.text: "Denkt Ihr, es wäre eine Gewohnheit der Diener der Inquisition, Unschuldige als Ketzer zu bezeichnen? Ein bedauernswertes Misstrauen – das werde ich mir merken."
languages.original_text: "Do you think the servants of the Inquisition are in the habit of calling the innocent heretics? Such lamentable distrust — I will remember it."

traits.locale_text: "Denkt Ihr, es wäre eine Gewohnheit der Diener der Inquisition, Unschuldige als Ketzer zu bezeichnen? Ein bedauernswertes Misstrauen – das werde ich mir merken."

languages.text: "Engizisyon'un hizmetkârlarının masumları kâfirlikle suçlama alışkanlığı olduğunu mu sanıyorsun? Güvensizliğin üzüntü verici, bunu unutmayacağım."
languages.original_text: "Do you think the servants of the Inquisition are in the habit of calling the innocent heretics? Such lamentable distrust — I will remember it."

traits.locale_text: "Engizisyon'un hizmetkârlarının masumları kâfirlikle suçlama alışkanlığı olduğunu mu sanıyorsun? Güvenmezliğin üzüntü verici, bunu unutmayacağım."
